column3: Traffic Alert for I-64E at the 74 MM:
column4: The right lane remains blocked as crews work to remove a semi that went off the roadway due to an earlier collision.

column3: I-75/I-71 at the Brent Spence Bridge (Cincinnati Area):
column4: The bridge is closed until further notice due to fire damage from a previous collision.
